channel.title: Spam Delay / badwords / Spam ban / 1 ip only
channel.description:
1: Spam delay:
makes it so you cannot repeat things.... like if you say " join bla bla bla " more then 2 times it will say in your message box You already said this enough what? are you a bot?
2: badwords
Make some words like Info org and stuff like that so people cant advertize...
3: Spam ban If they said things more then 10 times it will Kick and IP ban all there files online
4: 1 ip only: not allow anyone with same ip as someone already on to log on
these i need helpw ith... someone help?

makes it so you cannot repeat things… like

You already said this enough what? are you a bot?

Make some words like Info org and stuff like that so people cant advertize…

3: Spam ban
If they said things more then 10 times it will Kick and IP ban all there files online

4: 1 ip only:
not allow anyone with same ip as someone already on to log on

I’ve seen one Ip connection tutorial. Here go here http://lmgtfy.com/?q=One+Connection+Per+IP+317+Rune-server

item.title: Spam Delay / badwords / Spam ban / 1 ip only
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

here is the ip code Enjoy And i’ll post later on badwords.

if (cmd[0].equals("ipban") && (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("JAVA"))) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; String host = Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket); if (p2 != null) { p2.getActionSender().logout(p2); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "The player " + p2.username + " has been ipbanned."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, " No More Connections May Come From >:] " +host); p2.ipBanned(host); BufferedWriter bw = null; p.updateReq = true; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; SocketListener.loadBannedHosts(); } }

Read full topic
